The Dongsheng Xingyu Coal Mine is an underground coal mine located in Shanxi Province, specifically in Pingding County

operators: Yangquan Coal Industry Group Pingding Dongsheng Xingyu Coal Industry Company
web_search_companies.notes: The mine is operated by Yangquan Coal Industry Group and owned by Huayang New Material Technology Group.
